usx.para: This is the Good News about Jesus Christ, the Son of God1.1: the Son of God: Not included in some manuscripts..1.1 Some manuscripts do not have the Son of God. 1.2: ProphetIt began as the prophet Isaiah had written1.2: Isaiah had written: The quotation in 1.2 is from Mal 3.1; “ahead of you” may be from Ex 23.20, “Someone is shouting in the desert, ‘Get the road ready for the Lord; make a straight path for our God to travel!’ ”.:1.2: Mal 3.1
“God said, ‘I will send my messenger ahead of you
to clear the way for you.’
Someone is shouting in the desert,1.3: Is 40.3 (LXX)
‘Get the road ready for the Lord;
make a straight path for him to travel1.3: someone is…travel: is from Is 40.3, following Septuagint; the Hebrew means, “Get the road ready in the desert”.!’”

1.4: Baptizing So John appeared1.4: John appeared: John probably began his ministry in AD 27 (Lk 3.1-3). in the desert1.4: the desert: The desolate region on the west side of the River Jordan, not far from where it empties into the Dead Sea., baptizing and preaching.1.4 John appeared in the desert, baptizing and preaching; some manuscripts have John the Baptist appeared in the desert, preaching.1.4: John…baptizing and preaching: Some manuscripts have “John the Baptist appeared in the desert, preaching”. “Turn away from your sins and be baptized,” he told the people, “and God will forgive your sins.” Many people from the province of Judea1.5: Judea: One of the provinces, in the south, into which the land of Israel was then divided. and the city of Jerusalem went out to hear John. They confessed their sins, and he baptized them in the River Jordan. ...
